case_setup.name: case_setup
case_setup.description:
>
  Creates the case folder structure and initializes all JSON tracking files.
  Triggered when user indicates a new case (e.g., "new client", "new file").
  Requires only 3 inputs: client name, case type, and accident date.

steps.name: Recognize New Case Intent
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_0_onboarding/workflows/case_setup/workflow.md (Steps → Recognize New Case Intent)

steps.name: Gather Required Inputs
steps.description: Ask the user for any missing information:
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_0_onboarding/workflows/case_setup/workflow.md (Steps → Gather Required Inputs)

steps.name: Run Create Case Tool
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_0_onboarding/workflows/case_setup/workflow.md (Steps → Run Create Case Tool)

steps.name: Confirm Success
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_0_onboarding/workflows/case_setup/workflow.md (Steps → Confirm Success)

steps.name: Proceed to Document Collection
steps.description: Automatically transition to `document_collection` workflow to begin gathering intake documents.
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_0_onboarding/workflows/case_setup/workflow.md (Steps → Proceed to Document Collection)

document_collection.name: document_collection
document_collection.description:
>
  Collects required intake documents from personal injury clients based on case type
  (MVA, S&F, WC). Tracks document status, updates landmarks, and determines Phase 0
  completion. Uses fillable PDF templates from templates/intake_forms/. Supports
  DocuSign for electronic signatures on Fee Agreement, HIPAA, and other documents.
  Follows case_setup workflow automatically after new case creation.

steps.name: Load Document Checklist
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_0_onboarding/workflows/document_collection/workflow.md (Steps → Load Document Checklist)

steps.name: For Each Missing Document
steps.description: For each document not yet received, offer the user three options:
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_0_onboarding/workflows/document_collection/workflow.md (Steps → For Each Missing Document)

steps.name: Update Landmarks
steps.description: After each landmark document is received, update `workflow_state.json`:
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_0_onboarding/workflows/document_collection/workflow.md (Steps → Update Landmarks)

steps.name: Check Phase Completion
steps.description: After each update, check if all 3 landmarks are met:
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_0_onboarding/workflows/document_collection/workflow.md (Steps → Check Phase Completion)

templates: templates/intake_forms/  # Contains all fillable PDF templates

accident_report.name: accident_report
accident_report.description:
>
  Request and process police/accident report for motor vehicle accidents.
  This workflow identifies the reporting agency, requests the report,
  and extracts key information including parties, insurance, witnesses,
  and liability indicators using the police-report-analysis skill.

steps.name: Follow SOP
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_1_file_setup/workflows/accident_report/workflow.md

insurance_bi_claim.name: insurance_bi_claim
insurance_bi_claim.description:
>
  Open and set up Bodily Injury (BI) insurance claims against at-fault parties.
  Sends Letter of Representation, follows up for acknowledgment, obtains liability
  determination, and confirms coverage limits. When Claude needs to open a BI claim,
  send LOR to insurance carrier, check liability status, or verify BI coverage.
  Use for at-fault party insurance setup in MVA cases. Flags user when liability
  is not 100% accepted for potential additional claims.

steps.name: Identify At-Fault Party Insurance
steps.description: **Source:** Police report, property damage claim, or client communication
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_1_file_setup/workflows/insurance_bi_claim/workflow.md (Steps → Identify At-Fault Party Insurance)

steps.name: Send Letter of Representation
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_1_file_setup/workflows/insurance_bi_claim/workflow.md (Steps → Send Letter of Representation)

steps.name: Open Claim (if not already open)
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_1_file_setup/workflows/insurance_bi_claim/workflow.md (Steps → Open Claim (if not already open))

steps.name: Confirm Claim Acknowledgment
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_1_file_setup/workflows/insurance_bi_claim/workflow.md (Steps → Confirm Claim Acknowledgment)

steps.name: Obtain Liability Determination
steps.description: **Timeline:** Varies - can be immediate to weeks/months
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_1_file_setup/workflows/insurance_bi_claim/workflow.md (Steps → Obtain Liability Determination)

steps.name: Confirm Coverage and Policy Limits
steps.description: **Timeline:** Can take 30+ days after LOR (statutory disclosure period)
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_1_file_setup/workflows/insurance_bi_claim/workflow.md (Steps → Confirm Coverage and Policy Limits)

templates: templates/2022 Whaley LOR to BI Adjuster(1)(1)(1) (1).docx

insurance_pip_claim.name: insurance_pip_claim
insurance_pip_claim.description:
>
  Open and set up Personal Injury Protection (PIP) insurance claims. Runs the Kentucky
  PIP waterfall to determine correct carrier, completes KACP Application (ALWAYS required),
  sends Letter of Representation, follows up for acknowledgment, and confirms coverage
  ready to pay bills. When Claude needs to open a PIP claim, determine PIP carrier,
  complete PIP application, or verify PIP is paying bills. Use for MVA cases in Kentucky.

steps.name: Run PIP Waterfall
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_1_file_setup/workflows/insurance_pip_claim/workflow.md (Steps → Run PIP Waterfall)

steps.name: Complete KACP Application
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_1_file_setup/workflows/insurance_pip_claim/workflow.md (Steps → Complete KACP Application)

steps.name: Send Letter of Representation
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_1_file_setup/workflows/insurance_pip_claim/workflow.md (Steps → Send Letter of Representation)

steps.name: Open Claim (if needed)
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_1_file_setup/workflows/insurance_pip_claim/workflow.md (Steps → Open Claim (if needed))

steps.name: Confirm Claim Acknowledgment
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_1_file_setup/workflows/insurance_pip_claim/workflow.md (Steps → Confirm Claim Acknowledgment)

steps.name: Verify Ready to Pay Bills
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_1_file_setup/workflows/insurance_pip_claim/workflow.md (Steps → Verify Ready to Pay Bills)

templates: templates/2022 Whaley LOR to PIP Adjuster(1)(1) (1).docx

medical_provider_setup.name: medical_provider_setup
medical_provider_setup.description:
>
  Add medical providers to the case file with complete contact information,
  treatment dates, and injuries treated. AUTOMATICALLY sends medical records
  requests for providers with completed treatment (e.g., EMS, ER). Uses signed
  HIPAA from Phase 0. When Claude needs to add a medical provider, request
  medical records, or track provider treatment status. Use throughout case
  lifecycle as new providers are identified.

steps.name: Follow SOP
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_1_file_setup/workflows/medical_provider_setup/workflow.md

templates: templates/2023 Whaley Law Firm Medical Request Template (1).pdf
templates/2023 Whaley Initial Medical Billing Request to Provider (MBR) (1).pdf

client_check_in.name: client_check_in
client_check_in.description:
>
  Bi-weekly check-in with client during treatment to monitor their medical progress,
  identify new providers, gather updates on treatment status, and maintain the
  attorney-client relationship. This is a recurring workflow until demand is sent.

steps.name: Follow SOP
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_2_treatment/workflows/client_check_in/workflow.md

lien_identification.name: lien_identification
lien_identification.description:
>
  Identify and classify all potential liens that may affect case recovery during
  treatment phase. Includes Medicare, Medicaid, ERISA health plans, hospital liens,
  and letters of protection.

steps.name: Follow SOP
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_2_treatment/workflows/lien_identification/workflow.md

medical_chronology.name: medical_chronology
medical_chronology.description:
>
  Maintain running medical chronology as records are received. Extracts treatment
  information, researches medical terminology, identifies red flags, and generates
  professional chronology documents.

steps.name: Follow SOP
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_2_treatment/workflows/medical_chronology/workflow.md

medical_provider_status.name: medical_provider_status
medical_provider_status.description:
>
  Monitor and update treatment status for medical providers. Track whether
  client is still treating, has been discharged, or needs follow-up with
  each provider. This workflow helps identify when treatment is complete.

steps.name: Follow SOP
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_2_treatment/workflows/medical_provider_status/workflow.md

referral_new_provider.name: referral_new_provider
referral_new_provider.description:
>
  Facilitate referral of client to a new medical provider, either from
  another provider's referral or based on case needs. This workflow
  handles provider selection, appointment coordination, and case file updates.

steps.name: Follow SOP
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_2_treatment/workflows/referral_new_provider/workflow.md

request_records_bills.name: request_records_bills
request_records_bills.description:
>
  Request medical records and bills from healthcare providers. This workflow
  generates HIPAA-compliant records requests, tracks submissions, monitors for
  receipt, and triggers medical chronology updates when records are received.

steps.name: Follow SOP
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_2_treatment/workflows/request_records_bills/workflow.md

draft_demand.name: draft_demand
draft_demand.description:
>
  Draft the demand letter using gathered materials, templates, and case data.
  This workflow creates the demand narrative, compiles exhibits, and obtains
  attorney approval before the demand is sent.

steps.name: Follow SOP
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_3_demand/workflows/draft_demand/workflow.md

related_tools: tools/read_pdf.py (extract text from medical records for chronology)

gather_demand_materials.name: gather_demand_materials
gather_demand_materials.description:
>
  Collect all materials needed for the demand package including final medical
  records, bills, liens, wage loss documentation, and complete the medical
  chronology. This workflow ensures all components are ready before drafting.

steps.name: Follow SOP
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_3_demand/workflows/gather_demand_materials/workflow.md

send_demand.name: send_demand
send_demand.description:
>
  Send the approved demand letter and package to insurance adjuster(s).
  This workflow identifies recipients, coordinates sending, notifies the
  client, and sets up follow-up tracking.

steps.name: Follow SOP
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_3_demand/workflows/send_demand/workflow.md

negotiate_claim.name: negotiate_claim
negotiate_claim.description:
>
  Negotiate settlement with insurance company. This workflow handles receiving
  and documenting offers, calculating net to client, evaluating offers with
  attorney input, communicating with client, and responding to offers.

steps.name: Follow SOP
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_4_negotiation/workflows/negotiate_claim/workflow.md

offer_evaluation.name: offer_evaluation
offer_evaluation.description:
>
  Evaluate settlement offers and prepare recommendation for client. This workflow
  handles calculating net to client, analyzing offer merits, researching comparable
  verdicts, and coordinating client decision-making.

steps.name: Follow SOP
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_4_negotiation/workflows/offer_evaluation/workflow.md

track_offers.name: track_offers
track_offers.description:
>
  Document and track all offers and counteroffers throughout the negotiation
  process. This workflow maintains a complete record of negotiation history
  for each claim.

steps.name: Follow SOP
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_4_negotiation/workflows/track_offers/workflow.md

lien_negotiation.name: lien_negotiation
lien_negotiation.description:
>
  Negotiate lien reductions to maximize client recovery at settlement.
  This workflow handles Medicare, Medicaid, ERISA, hospital, and provider
  lien negotiations to reduce amounts owed and increase client net.

steps.name: Follow SOP
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_5_settlement/workflows/lien_negotiation/workflow.md

settlement_processing.name: settlement_processing
settlement_processing.description:
>
  Finalize settlement and distribute funds. This workflow handles settlement
  statement preparation, authorization to settle, release processing, check
  receipt, lien payment, and final distribution to client.

steps.name: Follow SOP
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_5_settlement/workflows/settlement_processing/workflow.md

final_distribution.name: final_distribution
final_distribution.description:
>
  Distribute remaining funds to client after all liens resolved. This workflow

steps.name: Follow SOP
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_6_lien/workflows/final_distribution/workflow.md

get_final_lien.name: get_final_lien
get_final_lien.description:
>
  Obtain final lien amounts from all outstanding lien holders. This workflow

  after settlement is reached.

steps.name: Follow SOP
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_6_lien/workflows/get_final_lien/workflow.md

negotiate_lien.name: negotiate_lien
negotiate_lien.description:

steps.name: Follow SOP
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_6_lien/workflows/negotiate_lien/workflow.md

draft_file_complaint.name: draft_file_complaint
draft_file_complaint.description:
>
  Draft and file complaint to initiate litigation. Creates complaint document,
  files with court, obtains summons. Use when decision made to sue, SOL approaching,
  or negotiation failed.

steps.name: Gather Case Information
steps.description: Compile facts, parties, damages from case file.
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_7_litigation/subphases/7_1_complaint/workflows/draft_file_complaint/workflow.md (Steps → Gather Case Information)

steps.name: Draft Complaint
steps.description: Generate complaint using template and case facts.
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_7_litigation/subphases/7_1_complaint/workflows/draft_file_complaint/workflow.md (Steps → Draft Complaint)

steps.name: Attorney Review
steps.description: Review for legal sufficiency and strategy.
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_7_litigation/subphases/7_1_complaint/workflows/draft_file_complaint/workflow.md (Steps → Attorney Review)

steps.name: E-File with Court
steps.description: File via eFlex, pay filing fee, receive case number.

steps.name: Obtain Summons
steps.description: Receive summons from clerk for each defendant.
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_7_litigation/subphases/7_1_complaint/workflows/draft_file_complaint/workflow.md (Steps → Obtain Summons)

process_answer.name: process_answer
process_answer.description:

  Use when answer deadline reached.

steps.name: Check for Answer
steps.description: Verify if answer filed by deadline.
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_7_litigation/subphases/7_1_complaint/workflows/process_answer/workflow.md (Steps → Check for Answer)

steps.name: Document Findings

steps.name: Default Path: File Default Motion
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_7_litigation/subphases/7_1_complaint/workflows/process_answer/workflow.md (Steps → Default Path: File Default Motion)

steps.name: Attend Default Hearing
steps.description: Present evidence of damages at prove-up hearing.
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_7_litigation/subphases/7_1_complaint/workflows/process_answer/workflow.md (Steps → Attend Default Hearing)

serve_defendant.name: serve_defendant
serve_defendant.description:
>
  Serve complaint and summons on all defendants. Coordinates service of process,
  tracks attempts, files proof of service, and calendars answer deadlines.
  Use after complaint filed and summons issued.

steps.name: Select Service Method
steps.description: Determine appropriate service method per defendant.
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_7_litigation/subphases/7_1_complaint/workflows/serve_defendant/workflow.md (Steps → Select Service Method)

steps.name: Arrange Service
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_7_litigation/subphases/7_1_complaint/workflows/serve_defendant/workflow.md (Steps → Arrange Service)

steps.name: Track Attempts
steps.description: Document each service attempt with date, method, result.
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_7_litigation/subphases/7_1_complaint/workflows/serve_defendant/workflow.md (Steps → Track Attempts)

steps.name: 5. Evaluate Service Failures (If Applicable)
steps.description: If 2+ service attempts have failed, consider alternative methods:

corp_rep_deposition.name: corp_rep_deposition
corp_rep_deposition.description:

  strategic goal identification, topic drafting with reasonable particularity,

defense_expert_depo.name: defense_expert_depo
defense_expert_depo.description:
>
  Plan and conduct defense expert depositions (DME/IME, liability experts). Covers
  dossier compilation, conflict mapping by juror archetype, trial preservation under
  KRE 804, and conflict-focused examination. Treats expert depositions as trial testimony.

steps.description: Prepare and serve discovery at least 60 days before deposition.

party_depositions.name: party_depositions
party_depositions.description:
>
  Plan and conduct depositions of adverse parties and key witnesses using rules-based
  examination framework. Covers deposition planning, notice drafting, rules-based
  outline preparation, and testimony extraction. Use when taking depositions of
  opposing individual parties and fact witnesses.

steps.name: Identify Deponents
steps.description: List all parties and witnesses to depose.

steps.name: Schedule Depositions

propound_discovery.name: propound_discovery
propound_discovery.description:
>
  Draft and serve written discovery on defendant. Includes interrogatories,
  requests for production, and requests for admission. Use after answer filed
  to gather liability facts, damages information, and documents.

steps.name: Plan Discovery Strategy
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_7_litigation/subphases/7_2_discovery/workflows/propound_discovery/workflow.md (Steps → Plan Discovery Strategy)

steps.name: Select Appropriate Templates
steps.description: Use the decision tree to select the appropriate templates based on:
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_7_litigation/subphases/7_2_discovery/workflows/propound_discovery/workflow.md (Steps → Select Appropriate Templates)

steps.name: Add Modular Question Sets (If Needed)
steps.description: Review case facts and add relevant modules:
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_7_litigation/subphases/7_2_discovery/workflows/propound_discovery/workflow.md (Steps → Add Modular Question Sets (If Needed))

steps.name: Draft Interrogatories

steps.description: Review and approve discovery before service:

review_responses.name: review_responses
review_responses.description:

  Review defendant's discovery responses for completeness and sufficiency.
  Identifies deficiencies, prepares follow-up, and initiates motion to
  compel if needed. Use when responses received from defendant.

steps.name: Review Document Production

steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_7_litigation/subphases/7_2_discovery/workflows/review_responses/workflow.md (Steps → Review Document Production)

attend_mediation.name: attend_mediation
attend_mediation.description:
>
  Attend and negotiate at mediation session. Executes negotiation strategy,
  responds to offers, works toward settlement. Use on mediation day to
  maximize settlement opportunity.

steps.name: Opening Session
steps.description: Present opening statement, establish case value.
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_7_litigation/subphases/7_3_mediation/workflows/attend_mediation/workflow.md (Steps → Opening Session)

steps.name: Private Caucuses
steps.description: Negotiate through mediator, adjust positions strategically.

steps.name: Evaluate Offers
steps.description: Analyze each offer, calculate net to client, advise client.
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_7_litigation/subphases/7_3_mediation/workflows/attend_mediation/workflow.md (Steps → Evaluate Offers)

steps.name: Client Consultations
steps.description: Keep client informed, get authority for positions.
steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_7_litigation/subphases/7_3_mediation/workflows/attend_mediation/workflow.md (Steps → Client Consultations)

steps.name: Work Toward Resolution
steps.description: Use negotiation tactics to bridge gap.

steps.name: Document Outcome

steps.manual_fallback: Open and follow workflows/phase_7_litigation/subphases/7_3_mediation/workflows/attend_mediation/workflow.md (Steps → Document Outcome)
